    • About Don Williams


    My job requires me to run my business on a daily basis, while listing and working with buyers, I also have to inspire and help teach my agents to be the best they can be. I try and tell my agents donât knock it until you tried it. I do have selected hearing, because I do not like excuses, you might as well be preaching to the choir. because I am not listening. I think to be a great Realtor or Team Leader, you must have FUN or make if FUN!! If it is not fun, then you can count me out! I admit that I am not the best teacher in the world, because I do not get it when they do not get it. I try and teach my agents to get 30 to 40% of their business on their own and not depend so heavily on me providing them with leads alone. Because to be successful in this business you must treat it like a job, not a hobby. There are far too many Realtorâs that think they can work when they want too, well I would question how successful they are. You always need a plan of attack, a worth while goal and a purpose of reaching further than you thought you could reach. I do not want to be a baby sitter, I want people who are motivated to achieve their goals and I also believe you cannot motivate someone who has no motivation, you need to have the Fire in the Belly to make it fun, have time off, and be financially successful. Sales people are the Highest paid people in the world if you are good at it, the best sales people make more money than Rock Stars and Actors!
